feat: implement SwiftUI 3-tab app matching mockup designs

Implemented comprehensive SwiftUI-based iOS app with Feeder, Options, and Dev tabs
matching the provided mockup images (production.png, options.png, developer.png).

## New Files Added

**Models (8 files):**
- BatteryStatus: Battery percentage, solar charging, online status
- RetentionPolicy: Photo/video retention days
- FeederMediaItem: Media items with weight, capture/expiry dates
- OptionsSettings: User-configurable settings with UserDefaults persistence
- DeviceSummary: Device status for Dev tab
- ConnectivityDiagnostics: Network health (no protocol names exposed)
- TelemetrySnapshot: Power and sensor telemetry
- LogEntry: Log entries for Dev diagnostics

**ViewModels (3 files):**
- FeederViewModel: Manages battery, photos, videos with mock API stubs
- OptionsViewModel: Settings management with UserDefaults persistence
- DevViewModel: Dev tools and diagnostics (wrapped in #if DEBUG)

**Views (3 files):**
- FeederView: Battery card, photo/video horizontal scrolls, share/delete
- OptionsView: Capture settings, quiet hours, notifications, retention
- DevView: Devices, connectivity, telemetry, actions, logs (#if DEBUG)

**Theme:**
- DesignSystem: Colors, typography, hex color initializer

## Key Features

**Feeder Tab:**
- Battery card with percentage bar and status indicators
- Charging via solar / on battery status with colored dots
- Online/offline indicator
- Photos and videos sections with horizontal scroll
- Media cards: thumbnails, weight, dates, share/delete buttons
- Video player with play button overlay
- Retention policy notices

**Options Tab:**
- Capture settings: min weight, type (radio buttons), cooldown
- Quiet hours: enable toggle, from/to times
- Notifications: low battery, visitor alerts
- Storage retention: read-only photo/video retention days
- Advanced: time zone auto-detect
- All settings persist to UserDefaults

**Dev Tab (DEBUG only):**
- Device search and list with battery/online status
- Connectivity diagnostics (NO protocol names like HTTP/MQTT)
- Power & telemetry: voltage, solar, temp, signal
- Retention policy with "Run cleanup now" button
- Actions: force telemetry, snapshot, reboot, factory reset
- Scrollable logs with monospaced timestamps

## Design System

- Colors: Teal primary (#0F9A95), gray background (#F5F6F8)
- Battery colors: green/yellow/red based on percentage
- Rounded system fonts matching mockups
- Card-based layout with shadows and rounded corners

## Technical Details

- MVVM architecture with @Published properties
- Async/await for all API calls
- Mock implementations ready for backend integration
- No MQTT code or protocol names in UI
- Dev tab fully wrapped in #if DEBUG for production builds
- ShareSheet reused for media sharing
- Pull-to-refresh on all tabs
- Error alerts with proper binding
